name: TheCursedDreamOfThomDemp
description:
GAMEJAM PROJECT : The Cursed Dream of Thom Demp

Theme: Infinity

Duration: 5 days

You play as a man in a dream locked in a mansion with a horrible creature lurking, ready to end your existence.

Your goal is to use the watch you find in front of you at the beginning of the game. And as explained in the letter next to it, wind each clock with the watch to make them ring.

All this without getting caught, of course. To avoid being spotted by the creature you can crouch down so as not to make noise and hide under tables, or run to quickly slip into a cupboard.

Activating a clock will turn back time and return the creature to its previous state. We hope you enjoy the game, good luck with it ;)

Team :

- Hugues De Lombaert (Game-Art)

- Maxence Simar (Game-Art)

- Theo Mortelette (Game-Art)

- Olivier Foccroulle (Game-Art)

- Marshall falques (Game-Anim)

- Emmie Courteau (Game-Anim)

- Damien De Lombaert (Tech-Art)

- Pierre De Laet (Tech-Art)

Controls: 

- Move : Z/Q/S/D

- Interact : Left click

- Use : Right Click

- Lean : A/E

- Sprint : Shift

- Crouch : Ctrl

Thank you in advance for playing !
